name: Hyrefox
description: HyreFox is an online marketplace connecting employers with seasoned headhunters across India. It streamlines collaboration via a single web-based application, reducing acquisition costs and increasing revenue for recruiting firms by accessing top-level mandates. HyreFox ensures efficient connections, creating a win-win situation for companies and professional recruiters.
features: Video Feedback System for Internal staff
Huge savings in HR – both time and money
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Hyrefox connects companies and professional recruiting firms from across India more efficiently.

Highlights.name: Streamlined Recruiter Management
Highlights.description: HyreFox simplifies the recruiter vendor management process for employers, making it easier to connect with and monitor recruiters.

Highlights.name: Efficient Job Crowdsourcing
Highlights.description: HyreFox enables efficient crowdsourcing of job openings to specialized recruiters, improving the chances of finding quality candidates quickly.

Highlights.name: Cost Control and Tracking
Highlights.description: Employers can efficiently control and track costs related to third-party recruiters through HyreFox's user-friendly platform.

enhanced_description: HyreFox is an online marketplace designed to efficiently connect employers with seasoned headhunters across India. It operates as a single web-based application, streamlining the recruiter vendor management process for employers and facilitating efficient crowdsourcing of job openings to specialized recruiters. The platform aims to reduce acquisition costs for companies while increasing revenue for recruiting firms by providing access to top-level mandates. Key features include on-demand video interviews and a video feedback system for internal staff, contributing to significant time and cost savings in HR. HyreFox also offers tools for employers to efficiently control and track costs related to third-party recruiters, ultimately boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity.
key_use_cases: Streamlining collaboration between employers and recruiting firms
Reducing recruitment acquisition costs for companies
Increasing revenue opportunities for recruiting firms
Crowdsourcing job openings to specialized recruiters
Controlling and tracking costs associated with external recruiters
Conducting on-demand video interviews with candidates
Providing video feedback for internal staff
Improving hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Online marketplace model for headhunter access
Increases revenue for recruiting firms through mandate access
Robust cost control and tracking for third-party recruiters
Offers video feedback system for internal staff
Promises significant HR time and money savings
roi_benefits: Huge savings in HR – both time and money
Reduction in recruitment acquisition costs for employers
